fields.description:
This leads to a segementation fault with the latest conda nigthlies on Python 3.8 / macOS

{code}
import pyarrow as pa
import numpy as np

arr = pa.chunked_array([
  [
    "m",
    "J",
    "q",
    "k",
    "t"
  ],
  [
    "m",
    "J",
    "q",
    "k",
    "t"
  ]
])

indices = np.array([0, 5, 1, 6, 2, 7, 3, 8, 4, 9])
arr.take(indices)
{code}
